name: Socks (avak)
description:
Socks is a multimedia strategy game that explores themes of friendship and triumph. 

STORY

Join Socks, a quiet little puppy, who happened to leave his house one day and find a lost kitten. The kitten, Sink, is far from the Catpital which he calls home. Will Sink and Socks be able to find the Catpital, and who might they meet along the way? 

CONTROLS

+ use arrow keys to move 

+ enter or right click for select and continue

+ escape and left click to cancel 

+ left click on map for menu

S-RPG

+ select an ally and then select where to move with the cursor

+ white tiles mean a character may land on that tile

+ red tiles mean a character may can attack that tile

+ left click on map for battle menu
